## Installing the data.table package

Explain why we can't use `read.csv` as we did before.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("data.table")
```

```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(data.table)
```

Getting help on the package.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
help(package=data.table)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
vignette("datable-intro")
```
